heading: Israel is reproved for her many sins—Ephraim is mixed among the people.
verses: When I would have healed Israel, then the iniquity of Ephraim was discovered, and the wickedness of Samaria: for they commit falsehood; and the thief cometh in,
the troop of robbers spoileth without.
